page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER
page.content: This area no longer has a "village Bobby".Fifteen years ago the local Wherstead Police Station was sold. Now P.C.Hodson and P.C Brunning are the two policemen who cover the Holbrook,Shotley,Freston ,Bentley, Wherstead,Tattingstone and Chelmondiston area. They are based at Holbrook.They patrol in rural beat vans. The main rural crimes are shoplifting,burglary,poaching and cattle rustling.This area is part of the Ipswich Division which has a burglary rate of about 50-60 a week although the area we are studying has no serious crime problem.The only serious crime in the last 10 years was the "Suitcase Murder."A body was chopped up and found in a suitcase in Tattingstone.The crime was not solved. P.C.Reeve is the School Liason Officer.
